Row.Text: Unwavering Loyalty

+15%[ICON_GREAT_GENERAL] Great General [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength bonus and +50% Spawn Rate. Tiles claimed by a Citadel's Culture Bomb grants an immediate boost of [ICON_PEACE] Faith, [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, and [ICON_GOLD] Gold (doubled if tiles owned by another civilization).
European Embrace

Begins the game as the founder of [ICON_RELIGION_CHRISTIANITY] Christianity. When a City-State first converts to [ICON_RELIGION_CHRISTIANITY] Christianity, gain +40 [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with that City-State. +1[ICON_PEACE] Faith, [ICON_FOOD] Food, [ICON_CULTURE] Culture from City-State Friends (doubled if Allied).
Rising Tide

+1[ICON_MOVES] Movement for Embarked Units. +1[ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from Fishing Boats. +1[ICON_GOLD] Gold, +1[ICON_CULTURE] Culture, and +1[ICON_PEACE] Faith from Sea [ICON_INTERNATIONAL_TRADE] Trade Routes.
Warlord of Shikoku
Embarked units have +1[ICON_MOVES] Movement and can defend themselves. +25%[ICON_PRODUCTION] Production towards a building if it already exists in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.
Disciple of Bishamonten

Begins the game as the founder of [ICON_RELIGION_SHINTO] Shinto. Units fight as though they were at full strength even when damaged. Gains [ICON_PEACE] Faith for the empire for each enemy unit killed.
Tiger of Kai
+1[ICON_PRODUCTION] Production per Pasture. All mounted units have +1[ICON_MOVES] Movement.
Lion of Sagami

Units receive a +20% [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat bonus when fighting in their own territory. +1[ICON_CULTURE] Culture for every defensive Building (Walls, Castles, Citadels). +4[ICON_CULTURE] Culture from each World Wonder.
The Great Unifier

Begins the game with a free Spy, but as the vassal of the Imagawa clan. All Diplomat Units receive +2[ICON_MOVES] Movement and the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Royal Signet[ENDCOLOR] promotion, granting +10[ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence from City-State missions.
Nembutsu

Begins the game as the founder of [ICON_RELIGION_JODO_SHINSHU] Jodo Shinshu Buddhism. Cannot purchase Missionaries or Inquisitors. When capturing an enemy City, automatically convert that city to [ICON_RELIGION_JODO_SHINSHU] Jodo Shinshu Buddhism.
Dragon's Resolve
Melee units cost 50% less maintenance. All units require 25% less experience to earn their next promotion.
Ambition
Begins the game with Tokugawa as a vassal.
Peasant Army
All Ashigaru (Bow Ashigaru, Yari Ashigaru, Katana Ashigaru) units receive +1 Sight and will heal every turn, even if they perform an action.
